meta.document: UTAC v2 Data Lanterns – Readiness Map

logistic_frame.order_parameter: manifest readiness ratios averaged across five UTAC v2 datasets
logistic_frame.zeta: codex + BreakPoint damping keeps ζ(R) focused while four lanterns await data/exports

implementation_nodes.action: Maintain logistic analysis on observed data (ΔAIC guard)
Re-run β>10 guard if dataset expands
Refresh readiness audit to broadcast activation

notes.formal: Θ≈3.2 & β≈14.5 confirmed on observed raster; ΔAIC≈1484 vs linear, ≥1718 vs power law.
notes.poetic: Die Urban-Heat Laterne leuchtet nun selbst – σ(β(R-Θ)) steigt steil und ζ(R) atmet ruhig.

notes.formal: Θ≈0.62 and β≈13.8 define the activation flank; falsify against linear_regression, power_law_fit, seasonal_arima. Readiness ratio=0.00 per audit.
notes.empirical: Missing components (4): data/climate/amazon_precip_evapo.nc, data/climate/amazon_precip_evapo.nc.metadata.json, analysis/results/amazon_hydro_fit.json, analysis/results/outlier_report.md. Integration scripts: analysis/climate_beta_extractor.py.
notes.poetic: Laterne utac-v1_3-ds-002 wartet, bis standardized_precipitation_index über Θ steigt und σ(β(R-Θ)) den Chor entzündet.
